skills_required: Proficient in at least one programming language such as Python, Java, or C++.
Understands core computer science fundamentals including data structures and algorithms.
Able to write clean, maintainable code and follow team coding standards.
Familiar with version control systems like Git for collaborative development.
Basic understanding of debugging tools and unit testing frameworks.
Demonstrated ability to design, implement, and maintain features in production systems.
Experience working with APIs and integrating third-party services.
Understands software lifecycle processes including code reviews, testing, and deployments.
Can independently troubleshoot and resolve bugs or performance issues.
Comfortable working with SQL and NoSQL databases for data storage solutions.
Expertise in backend programming languages such as Python, Java, or Node.js.
Hands-on experience building RESTful APIs and integrating them with frontend applications.
Proficiency with frameworks like Django, Spring Boot, or Express.js.
Solid knowledge of databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB) and query optimization.
Experience with containerization using Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes is a plus.
Advanced knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript (ES6+).
Experience building responsive web interfaces using frameworks like React, Vue.js, or Angular.
Familiar with design systems and component-based architecture.
Skilled in debugging browser issues and optimizing performance for frontend code.
Understanding of RESTful API integration and asynchronous JavaScript patterns.
Strong expertise in CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or GitLab CI.
Experience with containerization using Docker and orchestration via Kubernetes.
Deep understanding of infrastructure as code (IaC) tools such as Terraform or Ansible.
Proficiency with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.
Skilled in monitoring and logging tools like Prometheus, Grafana, or ELK stack.
